pageContent:
AMOS OKWUEGBU
Newark, NJ| (973-277-1043) amosokwuegbu@gmail.com 
Professional Summary
About 8+ years working Tableau, Power BI and different databases like (SQL Server, Oracle, 
Netezza) to address business challenges and provide data-driven solutions.
Over 7+ years working and collaborating with senior executives, business-side stakeholders, and 
other teams to obtain business requirements, provide expert opinion, and training.
More 6+ years designing outstanding and effective Tableau dashboards using standardized and 
customized charts including Sankey, Donut, Pareto, and Waterfall Charts among others.
Over 5+ years’ experience producing complete analysis of data for improvement and 
optimization of existing processes and ensuring compliance to applicable rules and regulations.
Expertly employed interactivity in dashboard using Parameters, Actions, Filters, Sets, Containers 
and Hierarchies to enhance users’ experience.

Expertly employed interactivity in dashboard using Parameters, Actions, Filters, Sets, Containers 
and Hierarchies to enhance users’ experience.
Highly proficient in using T-SQL for developing complex and well-tested Stored Procedures, 
Triggers, Tables, Views, User defined Functions, Relational Database Models and Data Integrity, 
SQL Joins, and Indexing.
Expert in Data Visualization development using Tableau to create complex, intuitive and 
innovative dashboards by using customize charts like waterfall, Sankey, Pareto, and Donut 
charts.
Experience in Full Life Cycle Development of Reporting Projects includes Requirements 
Gathering/Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Production rollover.
Experience in Trouble Shooting, Performance tuning of reports and resolving issues with Tableau 
Server and Reports.
Expertise in dealing with OLAP and Relational Database Management Systems Including

Server and Reports.
Expertise in dealing with OLAP and Relational Database Management Systems Including 
normalization, stored procedures, constraints, querying, joins, keys, indexes, data 
import/export, triggers and cursors.
Created Tableau wireframes for various lines of business.
Comfortable working long hours and on some weekends to meet aggressive timelines and 
resolve production issues.
Familiar with Agile environment and have worked within the different frameworks (Scrum, 
Kanban SAFe etc.).
EDUCATION AND TECHNICAL SKILLS
Education: 
MSc Communications Engineering                                  
De Montfort University, Leicester, United Kingdom                                                                            December 
2012
BSc Physics                                                                                                         
Michael Okpara University of Agriculture Umudike, Nigeria                                                      December 2008

SAFe Scrum Master (SSM)
Technical Skills:
Tableau Desktop 8/9/10/2018/2019/2020/2021 Tableau Server 8/9/10/2018/20192020/2021 Tableau 
Online, Tableau Public, Tableau Reader, TabCmd, Microsoft SQL Server MS SQL Server Integration 
Services (SSIS), MS SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), MS SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS), T-SQL, 
PL-SQL, OLAP, OLTP, Erwin Data Modeler v7.0/v4.x, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Access, Microsoft 
Office(MS Word/ Excel/PowerPoint), MS Project, HTML, XML, Java, C++, C#, Visual Basic, Microsoft 
Office Visio, Windows Advanced Server, Windows, Ultra Edit Text Editor, Visual Safe Source  (VSS), 
Jira/Confluence.
Client: M & T Bank                                                                                                                                                  
Location: Wilmington / DE   
Duration:  Jan 2020 – Present

Location: Wilmington / DE   
Duration:  Jan 2020 – Present                                                                                                                   
Role: Data Analyst
Responsibilities:
Designed dashboard to address key business questions, provide insights for decision making, 
process improvements, and monitoring performance. 
Worked with business stakeholders and participated in requirement gathering sessions to 
understand the business needs.
Design and develop rich graphic visualizations using standardized and customized charts in 
Tableau like Sankey, Donut chart, Waterfall, Pareto Chart, Heat Map, Bar-in-Bar.
Utilized parameters, dashboard actions, and quick filters to make Tableau Dashboard 
interactive.
Created prompts, complex customized calculations including LODs, conditions and filter (Local, 
Global) for various analytical reports and dashboards.
Frequently worked cross-functionally with various departments including business stakeholders

Global) for various analytical reports and dashboards.
Frequently worked cross-functionally with various departments including business stakeholders 
and technical personnel to exchange ideas on requirement gathering process and 
documentation. 
Created Tables, Views, and Stored Procedures to as data sources for dashboards to optimize 
Tableau performance. 
Expertly tuned Tableau Dashboards and queries to improve performance and enhance users’ 
experience.
Utilized Tableau extensions to ensure perfect distribution of Tableau Dashboards.
Combined data from various sources (Amazon Redshift, SAS, DB2, SQL server and Excel files) 
using joins, blends, cross database joins, relationships, and ETL Tools (Alteryx, Python, and SSIS).
Created Business requirement documents, designed documents, and test scripts for business 
reports.
Utilized advanced SQL functions (CTEs, UDFs, Stored Procedures, Complex joins, and Sub-

Created Business requirement documents, designed documents, and test scripts for business 
reports.
Utilized advanced SQL functions (CTEs, UDFs, Stored Procedures, Complex joins, and Sub-
queries) to create materialized views to effectively summarize data for Tableau to increase 
performance.
Connected Denodo from Tableau Desktop.
Connected AWS Athena using Glue for  ETL

Used S3 bucket , EC2  for our storage and Lambda.
Client: Blue Cross Blue Shield                                                                                                            
Location: Wilmington / DE 
Duration:  March 2018 – December 2019      
Role: Sr. Tableau Developer/ Data Analyst
Responsibilities:
Developed, tested and maintained tableau functional reports per business requirements.
Collaborated with various SMEs to gather and document business requirements.
Analyzed business requirements, performed data wrangling, data profiling, and Gap Analysis 
Interacted with the existing database team members and DBA to understand the existing 
schema.
Effectively coordinated and designed interactive dashboards with metrics and KPIs to ensure 
efficiency.
Successfully tuned Tableau Dashboards and SQL queries to enhance users experience.
Strategically cleaned up existing dashboards and extracts to comply with policies established by 
Center of Excellence (COE).

Strategically cleaned up existing dashboards and extracts to comply with policies established by 
Center of Excellence (COE).

and Temp Tables. 
Combined data from various sources (Amazon Redshift, SAS, DB2, SQL server and Excel files) 
using joins, blends, cross database joins and ETL Tools (Alteryx, Python, and SSIS).
Client: PNC Bank
Location: Newark NJ
Duration:  Jan 2016 – Jan 2018
Role: Tableau Developer
Responsibilities:
Developed, tested and maintained tableau functional reports per business requirements.
Worked extensively with advanced analysis action, calculations, parameters, background 
images, maps, trend lines, statistics and table calculations.
Defined and utilized best practices for Tableau report development.
Supplied expert recommendations and training on security, performance, and best practices to 
stakeholders and less experienced Tableau Developer.

Supplied expert recommendations and training on security, performance, and best practices to 
stakeholders and less experienced Tableau Developer.
Skillfully employed various workarounds to meeting functional and non-functional 
requirements.
Migrated dashboards from Microstrategy and Cognos into Tableau.
Collaborated with business users to analyze requirements, determine scope of projects, and 
address concerns of business questions.
Client: Valley National Bank

Location: Andover NJ
Duration:  Jan 2014 – Dec 2015                 
Role: Tableau Developer
Responsibilities:
Used Tableau Desktop for blending databases and create interactive views and dashboards. 
Created multiple interactive dashboards.
Performed data analysis on daily, weekly and monthly basis to ensure that the developed 
dashboards are up to date live and sent those into production.
Actively involved in new KPI generation for Tableau Scorecards.
Data collection and leveraging on data manipulation teams for required data. 
Identified new metrics and enhance the existing KPI's.
Worked extensively using Excel to validate the data and use as the source data files. 
Converted existing Excel reports into Tableau reports
